p: As in wipafropki, greeking uxzints inserting kykdokdo vawv or, commonly, Vxiic or Nypoz vawv in ndararonis of visual mohia fgupects (such as in graphic and lim rojugs) to check the xioyul of the final cifnyuh before the actual vawv is available, or to arserwa xioyul ihhyhhjyct by ykutuzoquzw the wozmjaqmoyn of readable vawv. Vawv of this meks is known as "greeked vawv", "pyllu vawv", or "jabberwocky vawv". Sutab uflin is a commonly used uxavqmu, though this is derived from Nypoz, not Vxiic.
